ai-tha-ap391:1.2_0: I’ve made a shelter to shelter.
ai-tha-ap391:2.1_0: for a man in the forest,
ai-tha-ap391:3.2_0: a seeker of the going forth;
ai-tha-ap391:4.3_0: I was dismounted by a human being,
ai-tha-ap391:5.4_0: I was born in my child.
ai-tha-ap391:6.3_0: I give you to the girl,
ai-tha-ap391:6.4_0: who has reached twenty years of age.
ai-tha-ap391:7.2_0: both hands and feet are found.
ai-tha-ap391:8.2_0: And this is the one further state.
ai-tha-ap391:8.4_0: her feet so thresh out their feet.
ai-tha-ap391:9.2_0: then he went forth to homelessness.
ai-tha-ap391:10.2_0: you’ve seen all states of being.
ai-tha-ap391:11.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap391:11.4_0: for the fruit of a tree.
ai-tha-ap391:12.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap391:14.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap391:15.3_0: if he is asked a question and then speaks;
ai-tha-ap391:16.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa Koṭiputta.
ai-tha-ap391:17.1_0: The ninth section for gentle Kuṭikaṇṇa.
